price: ߣߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ( ߛߊߟߌ ) ߞߐߡߊߓߌߘߌ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߛߐ߲߬ ߞߐߡߊߓߌߘߌ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߞߏ ߡߊ߬
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
